lead_paragraph: Donato Hanover matched the fastest mile by a trotter, winning the $742,000 Kentucky Futurity in 1 minute 50.1 seconds at The Red Mile in Lexington, Ky. Donato Hanover matched the record set earlier in the day by Giant Diablo and set a record for 3-year-old colt trotters. The victory was Donato Hanover’s 19th in 20 career starts.
